answerText: ANOVA [or Analysis of Variance][10] In ANOVA, if the F-statistic is significantly higher than the critical value, this hypothesis must be rejected. It refers to the default position that there is no correlation between two conditions.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 5 | 11 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question: A test used to perform this technique divides the MST by the MSE to get the F-statistic. For 10 points each: [10] Name this technique, an alternative to the T-test that can compare more than two groups of data.
